member.name: T:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.AbstractContextSeeder
member.summary: An abstract class for all seedable classes. The abstract class contains properties to help order seeding steps where one seed must complete before another seed.

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.AbstractContextSeeder.Order
member.summary: The order the seed needs to be persisted to the database

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.AbstractContextSeeder.Seed(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceScope)
member.summary: Persists the seed data into the database. Seed class gets to write their seed logic
member.param: Inject the service provider to get instance of your database context

member.name: T:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.ContextUpdater
member.summary: Default DbUpdater implementation depending on EFCore to persist code first entities

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.ContextUpdater.DeployMigrationFromCLI(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHost,System.String[])
member.summary: Static method to perform all the migrations using the argument tree

member.name: T:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.DbContextMigration
member.summary: Implementation of the DbContext migration class for persisting code-first entities into the database. This includes actual migration and logical seeding

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.DbContextMigration.PersistScript
member.summary: Persists SQL script into the database

member.name: T:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.IContextDeployable
member.summary: Interface for propalgating entities to the persistence later

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.IContextDeployable.PersistMigration
member.summary: Completes the migration of the code first entities to the database

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.IContextDeployable.PersistScript
member.summary: Deploys Raw SQL scripts to the database using EF Core

member.name: M:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.IContextSeedable.PersistSeed
member.summary: Executes seed logic by looking into the DbContext assembly to fetch all types that extends the and executes its seed method.
member.remarks: The Seed method uses the argument to allow instance to the DbContext class from the dependency injection tree

member.name: T:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption
member.summary: Console options expected when the instance of the dbupdater is ran

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption.Help
member.summary: Set option to true to display help

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption.Scripts
member.summary: All the SQL scripts to be deployed as part of the migration

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption.Migrate
member.summary: Set to true if migration needs to be persisted into the database

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption.Seed
member.summary: Set to true if seed data needs to be persisted into the database

member.name: P:DbUpdater.EFCore.CLI.MigrationOption.Context
member.summary: Type to get the EF context / DBContext instance from
member.remarks: Defaults to executing assembly if no value is provided
